summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 18, University Park Addition, being the alley between 17th Avenue Northeast and 18th Avenue Northeast, extending from East 45th Street to East 47th Street, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6766, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
